transcript.text:
￼














Template & Studio


Managing Images
Mask Images

2 min
overview & purpose mask image helps in applying a shape effect on the images used while desiging product for example, applying a brush stroke effect on the image as displayed below the mask tab from the designer studio >> images page allows the admin to view and add new mask images view & add a new mask image you can see the listing of all the mask images uploaded in the system for the designer studio by navigating to the admin >> designer studio >> images >> mask tab to add a mask image, click on the ‘+ add ’ button at the top right corner select the mask category for the new mask image and upload multiple images under that category at once now, when a customer uploads a jpg image in the designer studio, they’ll get the option to apply ‘mask & border’ in the image property panel these mask images will be listed under this section, where customers can choose to apply the mask to their uploaded jpg images
Did this page help you?
